app_descript:
App Name: BirdNET: Bird sound identification

Brief: Get to know the birds that share your environment with BirdNET, an app designed to recognize over 3,000 bird species by their unique sounds. Catered for bird enthusiasts and professionals, BirdNET brings biological expertise to the palm of your hand, allowing you to record bird calls and receive instant species identification. The app's latest update has only made it simpler for new users and more robust for offline use.

  • ğŸ“± Offline Functionality: Save recordings to analyze later, ensuring you can still identify birds without an immediate internet connection ğŸŒ.
  • ğŸ¦‰ Detailed Bird Profiles: Access comprehensive information about each bird species, including visuals, life history, habitat maps, and reference sounds ğŸ”ˆ.
